translations.en: In the name of Yeshua

translations.en: the name of the redeemer, Emanuel

translations.en: O Lord my God, when I in awesome wonder

translations.en: Then sings my soul, my Savior God, to Thee

slides.translation: How great Thou art! How great Thou art!

translations.en: How great Thou art! How great Thou art!
translations.cs: JAK VELKÝ JSI, JAK VELKÝ JSI!
translations.es: "¡CUÁN GRANDE ES TU NOMBRE, SUBLIME ERES TÚ!"

slides.translation: Then sings my soul, My Savior God, to Thee

translations.en: Then sings my soul, My Savior God, to Thee
translations.cs: PAK MÁ DUŠE ZPÍVÁ, MŮJ SPASITELI, TOBĚ
translations.ru: МОЕЙ ДУШИ ХВАЛА ВОСХОДИТ К ТРОНУ СЛАВЫ

slides.translation: How great Thou art! How great Thou art!

translations.cs: JAK VELKÝ JSI, JAK VELKÝ JSI!
translations.ru: "ПРЕВОЗНЕСЁН И СВЯТ, И СВЯТ ТЫ, БОЖЕ!"
translations.es: "¡EXALTADO Y SUBLIME, SANTO ERES TÚ!"

slides.translation: When through the woods, and forest glades I wander

translations.en: When through the woods, and forest glades I wander

translations.en: And hear the birds sing sweetly in the trees

translations.en: When I look down, from lofty mountain grandeur

slides.transliteration: ve'az ezkor ha'el khanun rav khesed

translations.cs: POSLAL HO ZEMŘÍT, SOTVA TO MOHU POCHOPIT

slides.originalText: עַל עֵץ הַצְּלָב מַשָּׂא פִּשְׁעִי עָמַס הוּא
slides.transliteration: al ets hatslav masa pishi amas hu

slides.translation: whenever we gaze upon You

translations.en: whenever we gaze upon You

slides.translation: whenever we gaze upon You

translations.en: whenever we gaze upon You
translations.es: CUANDO TE CONTEMPLAMOS

slides.originalText: והיום אני מכריז שאתה אבי ואני בנך
slides.transliteration: veayom ani mahriz sheata avi veani binha
slides.translation: today I proclaim You as father and I-your son

slides.originalText: לך בעקבותי, ותראה שאני אשנה אותך
slides.transliteration: leh beikvotai vetire sheani ashane otha

translations.en: Follow me and see how I change you
translations.cs: JDI V MÝCH STOPÁCH A UVIDÍŠ, JAK TĚ PROMĚNÍM
translations.ru: ИДИ ЗА МНОЙ И УВИДИШЬ, КАК Я ИЗМЕНЮ ТЕБЯ

slides.originalText: גש לפני ותן לרוחי למלא אותך
slides.transliteration: gash lefanai veten leruhi lemale otha
slides.translation: Come before me and let My spirit fill you

translations.cs: PŘEDSTUP PŘEDE MĚ A NECH MÉHO DUCHA TĚ NAPLNIT

translations.en: I will worship You Lord

translations.en: I will worship You my God

slides.translation: I fall on my face

translations.en: I fall on my face

slides.translation: Giving You all of my desires

translations.en: Giving You all of my desires
translations.es: ENTREGÁNDOTE TODOS MIS DESEOS

slides.translation: Lord take my life

translations.en: Lord take my life

slides.translation: As a living sacrifice for You

translations.en: As a living sacrifice for You

slides.translation: Lord here on earth as it is in heaven

translations.en: Lord here on earth as it is in heaven
translations.cs: PANE, JAKO V NEBI, TAK I ZDE NA ZEMI
translations.ru: ГОСПОДЬ, КАК НА НЕБЕ, ТАК И НА ЗЕМЛЕ

slides.translation: I just want to worship You

translations.en: I just want to worship You
translations.es: SIMPLEMENTE QUIERO ADORARTE

slides.originalText: אני פשוט רוצה לברך את שמך
slides.transliteration: ani pashut rotseh levarech et shimcha
slides.translation: I just want to bless Your name

translations.en: I just want to bless Your name
translations.ru: Я ПРОСТО ХОЧУ БЛАГОСЛОВЛЯТЬ ИМЯ ТВОЁ

translations.en: So here's my life, take it
translations.cs: TAK TADY JE MŮJ ŽIVOT, VEZMI SI HO

slides.originalText: אלוהי, אתה כל כך יפה בעיני
slides.transliteration: elohai, ata kol kach yafeh be'enay
